component_config.title: Cypher Search Interface
component_config.description: Advanced graph query interface for power users

facility_patterns.title: Cross-Facility Pattern Analysis
facility_patterns.description: Find similar failure patterns across different facilities
facility_patterns.template:
MATCH (p:Problem)-[r:ANALYZES]-(rc:RootCause)
WHERE p.name CONTAINS $pattern
RETURN p.name as problem, rc.root_cause as cause, count(*) as frequency
ORDER BY frequency DESC
LIMIT $limit

equipment_relationships.title: Equipment Relationship Mapping
equipment_relationships.description: Explore relationships between equipment types and failure modes
equipment_relationships.template:
MATCH (p:Problem)
WHERE p.name CONTAINS $equipment_type
MATCH (p)-[r:ANALYZES]-(rc:RootCause)
RETURN p.name as problem, rc.root_cause as root_cause, rc.objective_evidence as evidence
ORDER BY p.name
LIMIT $limit

temporal_analysis.title: Time-Based Incident Analysis
temporal_analysis.description: Analyze incidents and patterns over time periods
temporal_analysis.template:
MATCH (p:Problem)-[r:ANALYZES]-(rc:RootCause)
WHERE p.problem_id CONTAINS $year
RETURN substring(p.problem_id, -4) as year, p.name as problem, rc.root_cause as cause
ORDER BY year DESC, p.name
LIMIT $limit

root_cause_clustering.title: Root Cause Pattern Clustering
root_cause_clustering.description: Group similar root causes to identify systemic issues
root_cause_clustering.template:
MATCH (rc:RootCause)
WHERE rc.root_cause CONTAINS $keyword
RETURN rc.root_cause as cause, rc.objective_evidence as evidence, count(*) as occurrence_count
ORDER BY occurrence_count DESC
LIMIT $limit

basic_exploration.title: Database Schema Exploration
basic_exploration.query: MATCH (n) RETURN DISTINCT labels(n) as node_types, count(n) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
basic_exploration.description: Explore the basic structure and node types in the database

relationship_overview.title: Relationship Types Overview
relationship_overview.query: MATCH ()-[r]->() RETURN DISTINCT type(r) as relationship_type, count(r) as count ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 20
relationship_overview.description: See all relationship types and their frequencies

sample_problems.title: Sample Problem Analysis
sample_problems.query: MATCH (p:Problem)-[:ANALYZES]-(rc:RootCause) RETURN p.name as problem, rc.root_cause as cause LIMIT 10
sample_problems.description: View sample problems and their root causes
